DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this research is to determine if body composition influence the effect of breakfast composition on postprandial (post-meal) hunger, metabolic and energy expenditure response in normal weight, overweight, and obese young women.
DOC.brief_title: Breakfast and Energy Expenditure in Young Women
DOC.criteria: BMI over 18.5 No medication Food allergies Habitual breakfast skipping (> 5 times per week) Picky eater Dietary restrictions
